and( Name = VLOOKUP ($ObjectType.cgcloud__Contract_Payment__c.Fields.Name , $ObjectType.cgcloud__Contract_Payment__c.Fields.Name, Name ),
not( Id=VLOOKUP ($ObjectType.cgcloud__Contract_Payment__c.Fields.Id , $ObjectType.cgcloud__Contract_Payment__c.Fields.Name, Name )))
